name: Zac Anger
summary: Web and Linux enthusiast with experience with a broad range of technologies. Interested in environments that encourage constant learning and professional growth. Passionate about building better interfaces and smoother processes, and keeping software and development free and open.

relevant experience.name: Jane.com
relevant experience.position: Frontend Developer, Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineer
relevant experience.summary: Worked on product teams building front-end apps including the React re-write of Jane.com and internal apps. Worked on infrastructure teams on CI/CD, monitoring, testing, and developer tooling.
relevant experience.technologies: React, CSS and Styled-Components, Linux, Koa, Express, Redux, AWS, Docker, Graphql and Apollo, Flow, Typescript, NGINX, Angular, TeamCity, CircleCI.

relevant experience.name: DevMountain

relevant experience.technologies: Node, Express, Angular, Chromium (extensions), CSS/preprocessors, MongoDB/Mongoose, build systems, Linux.

education.name: DevMountain
